objects.description: The [Triton](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0013) Python script is also capable of autodetecting Triconex controllers on the network by sending a specific UDP broadcast packet over port 1502.(Citation: CISA Advisory (ICSA-18-107-02) Dec 2018)

external_references.description: ICS-CERT. (2018, December 18). Advisory (ICSA-18-107-02) - Schneider Electric Triconex Tricon (Update B). Retrieved March 8, 2019.
